chapter.text: aur is shaanti ke nagar kee shapath
hamane inasaan ko manohar roop mein paida kiya hai
phir use sabase neeche gira diya
parantu, jo eemaan laaye tatha sadaachaar kiye, unake lie aisa badala hai, jo kabhee samaapt nahin hoga
phir (tum maanav jaati) pratiphal (badale) ke din ko kyon jhuthalaate ho
kya allaah sab adhikaariyon se badh kar adhikaaree nahin hai
